title: Authorizes commissioner of economic development to grant matching funds to eligible applicants to implement Hudson Valley regional agricultural marketing program
summary: Authorizes commissioner of economic development to grant matching funds to eligible applicants to implement the Hudson Valley agricultural regional marketing program, defined as the use of media advertising and promotional materials for purposes of marketing agricultural production within the region.
actClause: AN ACT to amend the economic development law, in relation to providing matching funds for eligible applicants in the Hudson Valley agricultural regional marketing program
